Verses: 1 vaanangal Dhevanudaiya Magimaiyai Velippaduththugiradhu, Aagaayavirivu Avarudaiya Karangalin Kiriyaiyai Arivikkiradhu.
2 pagalukkup Pagal Vaarththaigalaip Pozhigiradhu, Iravukku Iravu Arivaith Therivikkiradhu.
3 avaigalukkup Pechchumillai, Vaarththaiyumillai, Avaigalin Saththam Ketkappaduvadhumillai.
4 aagilum Avaigalin Saththam Boomiyengum, Avaigalin Vasanangal Poochchakkaraththuk Kadaisivaraikkum Sellugiradhu; Avaigalil Sooriyanukku Oru Koodaaraththai Sthaabiththaar.
5 adhu Than Manavaraiyilirundhu Purappadugira Manavaalanaippolirundhu, Paraakkiramasaaliyaippol Than Paadhaiyil Oda Makizhchchiyaayirukkiradhu.
6 adhu Vaanangalin Oru Munaiyilirundhu Purappattu, Avaigalin Marumunai Varaikkum Sutriyodugiradhu; Adhin Gaandhikku Maraivaanadhu Ondrumillai.
7 karththarudaiya Vedham Kuraivatradhum, Aaththumaavai Uyirppikkiradhumaayirukkiradhu; Karththarudaiya Saatchi Saththiyamum, Pedhaiyai Gnaaniyaakkugiradhumaayirukkiradhu.
8 karththarudaiya Niyaayangal Semmaiyum, Irudhayaththai Sandhoshippikkiradhumaayirukkiradhu; Karththarudaiya Karpanai Thooimaiyum, Kangalaith Thelivikkiradhumaayirukkiradhu.
9 karththarukkup Bayappadugira Bayam Suththamum, Endraikkum Nilaikkiradhumaayirukkiradhu; Karththarudaiya Niyaayangal Unmaiyum, Avaigal Anaiththum Needhiyumaayirukkiradhu.
10 avaigal Ponnilum, Migundha Pasumponnilum Virumbappadaththakkadhum, Thenilum Thenkoottilirundhu Ozhugum Thelithenilum Madhuramulladhumaai Irukkiradhu.
11 andriyum Avaigalaal Umadhu Adiyen Echcharikkappadugiren; Avaigalaik Kaikkollugiradhinaal Migundha Balan Undu.
12 than Pizhaigalai Unarugiravan Yaar? Maraivaana Kutrangalukku Ennai Neengalaakkum.
13 thunigaramaana Paavangalukku Umadhu Adiyenai Vilakkikkaarum, Avaigal Ennai Aandukolla Ottaadhirum; Appozhudhu Naan Uththamanaagi, Perumpaadhagaththukku Neengalaayiruppen.
14 en Kanmalaiyum En Meetparumaagiya Karththaave, En Vaayin Vaarththaigalum, En Irudhayaththin Thiyaanamum, Umadhu Samugaththil Pireedhiyaayiruppadhaaga.
